Hmm... I can't really see anyone naming a place
Jakarta-town. If the place was older than Jakarta,
then the name makes no sense, and if it was built (or
renamed) by Jakarta then he'd want something more
grandiose than "Jakarta-town". Alexander the Great
made dozens of cities in his own name, with all sorts
of interesting names like Alexandria and
Alexandropolis, but never Alexander-town! How about a
simple name, like Jakarr?
   -T.
